titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the small issuer exception from the tax-exempt bond arbitrage rebate requirement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions concerning the small ($5 million or less) issuer exception from the tax exempt bond arbitrage requirement.
